review:
I recently had the pleasure of visiting Codex PolyClinic for a dental filling procedure, and I am beyond impressed with the level of care and professionalism I received.

Dr. Sherien Hussain and the entire team made me feel comfortable from the moment I walked in. They took the time to explain the procedure, ensuring I understood each step. Dr. Sherien Hussain's expertise was evident as they skillfully performed the filling, making sure I was at ease throughout.

The clinic itself was clean, modern, and equipped with the latest technology. The staff's attention to hygiene and safety measures was truly commendable.

I can confidently say that Codex PolyClinic is my go to place for all my dental needs. If you're looking for a dental clinic that combines top notch dentistry with a warm and friendly environment, I highly recommend Codex PolyClinic. Thank you for a fantastic experience!

I am a person who feels scared when having a dentist's appointment. A friend of mine recommended Dr. Sherein and it was my first time at her clinic and the way she made me comfortable and cleared all my doubts in such a friendly way. She treated my tooth problem and it was a great experience. I would recommend everyone to visit her clinic. 10/10. :)
reply_text: Thank you for response. Do visit again.

review: The best dental care I have ever experienced! Professional, courteous, and friendly behaviour of Dr. Sherien Hussain made me feel like familyâ€¦ would highly recommend to anyone!!!

A very dedicated, disciplined professional with an excellent patient handling skills. I highly recommend everyone to visit the doctor to get safe and effective treatment from her.  **** ****** *** **** ****** ************ **** ********

Immense cooperative behaviour. She treats in a very friendly and generous way. If y'all facing any issues and wants a best effective treatment with a kind gesture you should must visit her. Overall great experience
reply_text: Thank you for kind response. Do visit again

You must visit for any tooth problems. 
Very humble generous and kind lady.
Moreover good doctor with proper diagnosis 
Regards Megha Sharma

review: Great! I'm glad to hear that you had a positive experience with your root canal treatment at Codex Polyclinic. The staff seems to have been welcoming and professional, creating a comfortable environment for you. It's also good to know that the dentist explained the procedure in detail and ensured your comfort throughout the treatment. The cleanliness and modern equipment of the clinic added to your overall satisfaction.

Highly recommended. 
Request to have dental checkup when so ever required. Great patient handling experience, good communication skills and  wonderful doctor patient relationship.

I got my RCT done from her and had a great experience. Amazing and so polite Dr. Sherien Hussain so great in her work overall experienced she treats in a very friendly and generous way.Dr. Sherien Hussain made me feel like family .
